generic: Track and mention modifications in the source code
obligations.name: Marking modifications
obligations.verbatim: 2. Altered source versions must be plainly marked as such, and must not be misrepresented as being the original software.

generic: Reproduce license and legal mentions in documentation
obligations.name: Acknowledgment in the product documentation
obligations.verbatim: 1. The origin of this software must not be misrepresented; you must not claim that you wrote the original software. If you use this software in a product, an acknowledgment in the product documentation would be appreciated but is not required.

generic: Preserve legal mentions in source code
obligations.name: Preserve License in source code
obligations.verbatim: 3. This notice may not be removed or altered from any source distribution.
